Episode.summary: When Clarke discovers a horrifying project being carried out in Mount Weatherâ€™s medical ward, she joins forces with an unlikely ally. After Abby confesses to committing a crime, Kane issues an order to have her brutally punished. Meanwhile, Monty warns a distracted Jasper that Clarke could be in trouble, and Octavia continues to fight for Lincoln.
Episode.title: Reapercussions
